summary: Backend API testing completed for EMI Device Admin application. All 13 tests passed. Key features verified: admin data segregation (admin_id required for stats/reports), profit report with admin name/lastname, and client creation.

success_rate.frontend: N/A - React Native/Expo app (skip per instructions)

seed_data_creation: Test clients created with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend API endpoints working correctly. Admin data segregation implemented - /api/stats, /api/reports/collection, /api/reports/clients require admin_id parameter. /api/reports/financial includes admin object with first_name, last_name when admin_id provided. POST /api/clients with admin_token correctly assigns admin_id.
verified_features: POST /api/admin/login - returns token and admin id (PASS)
GET /api/stats without admin_id - returns 422 validation error (PASS)
GET /api/reports/collection without admin_id - returns 422 validation error (PASS)
GET /api/reports/clients without admin_id - returns 422 validation error (PASS)
GET /api/reports/financial without admin_id - still works, no admin info (PASS)
